flawed_nl_solution:
At the meeting, 200-100=<<200-100=1000>>1000 people decided to have a snack.
20 new people came in to snack and the area had 1000+20=<<1000+20=1020>>1020 of them eating.
1020/2=<<1020/2=510>>510 people got full and left.
10 more new people came to join in the snacking so 510+10=<<10+510=520>>520 people were eating.
After 30 people left, 520-30=<<520-30=490>>490 people who were eating remained.
In the end, only 490/2=<<490/2=245>>245 kept eating.
#### 245

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
